pages.text: $(item)Reactor Plating$() increases a Reactor's Heat capacity, and lowers the meltdown explosion radius.$(br2)Reactor Plating has no Coolant, and only serves to modify the Reactor itself.

There are two specialized upgrades:$(li)$(item)Containment Reactor Plating$() is much better at reducing the meltdown explosion, but adds less to the Heat Capacity$(li)$(item)Heat-Capacity Reactor Plating$() adds a lot more to the Heat Capacity, but reduces the meltdown explosion radius by a lot less
